intro_only_event_buddiesjoin_pm0059_00_a: Did you want to meet my Arcanine, too?

I raised him from a Growlithe back in my Kanto
days. Isn’t he something?

He’s on a whole ’nother level compared to all the
other Arcanine out there.

Yes indeed. Look at this fur... And he’s got such
sturdy legs...

As a Fire-type Gym Leader, I must admit
I’m impressed!
Heheh! Right? And to be honest...

I’ve incorporated what I learned from my battle at
Cinnabar Gym into training this guy!

Oh? So you’ve taken some of my battle tactics and
made them your own?!

I see why so many people are drawn to you, just
like Arcanine.

Y’know, I’m gonna start battling as a sync pair
with Arcanine!

If we end up on the same team, all you gotta do
is leave it to us!

We’ll show you a battle just as hot as anything
Red’s Charizard can do!
